TEI.2.document_title: Joseph Phillips to Stephen F Austin, 05-30-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Joseph Philips to Austin, New Orleans, May 30, 1881. Asking Austin the price of white-pine plank in Texas. (Omitted.)
